titleStmt.title: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 11: Images (Mälkə'a Guba'e)

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.
Transformed with permission to create a stub record from https://findingaids.princeton.edu/collections/C0776/cPRet00107.xml . See https://github.com/BetaMasaheft/Documentation/issues/1181.

msIdentifier.idno: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 11: Images (Mälkə'a Guba'e)

summary.p: Illustration: Fol. 2r: Pen trial, pencil scrawl, crude drawing.
Fols. 16v, 52r: In different hand, the later owners' names Wälätä Maryam and Wälätä Kidan appear.
Fols. 26r, 27v, 37r, 38r, 39v: Various person's names appear in a crude hand in pencil.
Pencil scrawl in the margins on almost every folio.

References: See references for Images listed in manuscript no. 7. Regarding Mystagogia, see the works Ernst Hammerschmidt, Aethiopische liturgische Texte der Bodleian Library in Oxford. Verö̈ffentlichung, Nr. 38. Berlin: Akademie, 1960. pp. 48-72; Déborah Lifchitz and Sylvain Grébaut. Textes éthiopiens magico-religieux. Paris: Institut d'ethnologie, 1940. pp. 40-52; Velat, Me'eraf vol. 1, pp. 215-217.

msItem.title: Prayer To the Holy Church. "I Salute the Holy Church and I Kiss You by the Kiss (the Love) of the Holy Spirit..."
Image of Saint Michael, Mälkə'a Mika'el
Image of Saint George, Mälkə'a Giyorgis, Zä-Säleda Mogäs
